other_tests.findings: Presence of drug-resistant HIV variants documented by sequencing of HIV reverse-transcriptase and protease genes.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Emergence of additional mutations associated with resistance to various antiretroviral drugs observed. Poor adherence led to virologic rebound.

other_tests.findings: Emergence of drug-resistant HCMV strains in both patients, with various mutations associated with resistance.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Multiple relapses of HCMV retinitis were documented, with patients developing resistance over time to ganciclovir and foscarnet treatments.

other_tests.findings: HCMV retinitis documented in both patients.
other_tests.changes_over_time: First episodes of retinitis were observed followed by relapses; one patient showed high levels of HCMV load in blood at a later stage.
